mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.tongzhi_name as tongzhiName ,a.tongzhi_types as tongzhiTypes ,a.tongzhi_text as tongzhiText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yuangong.yuangong_name as yuangongName ,yuangong.yuangong_phone as yuangongPhone ,yuangong.yuangong_id_number as yuangongIdNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_photo as yuangongPhoto ,yuangong.yuangong_email as yuangongEmail
FROM tongzhi a left JOIN yuangong yuangong ON a.yuangong_id = yuangong.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yuangong_id = #{params.yuangongId} )
and a.tongzhi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.tongzhiName},'%')
and a.tongzhi_types = #{params.tongzhiTypes}
and a.tongzhi_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.tongzhiText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yuangong_id IS NOT NULL
and yuangong.yuangong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongName},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongPhone},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongIdNumber},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
